import {Button, Col, Form, Modal, Row} from "react-bootstrap"; import {useState} from "react"; let MyModal = ({showModal, setShowModal, state, setState}) => { console.log(state[showModal.index]) const [validated, setValidated] = useState(false); const handleSubmit = (event) => { const form = event.currentTarget; event.preventDefault(); if (form.checkValidity() === false) { event.stopPropagation(); } setValidated(true); }; return ( setShowModal({...showModal, visible: false})}> Change data
Введите какое-нибудь значение
{/* */} ) } export default MyModal;
